Reviews.Content: transaction was ok I got the time I'm satisfied with this product I would recommend this who kept not sitting behind a desk only live on the ru

Reviews.Title: love!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great phone.  works very well. Is exactly as described. tested it in the water and it still work! Great buy

Reviews.Title: flashy but is not what it seems
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: Teléfono bonito, pero de baja calidad, pixeles muertos, botón en mal funcionamiento, software se pega al transferir datos, cámara muy mala. No lo recomiendo.Nice phone, but low quality, dead pixels, button malfunction, software sticks to transfer data, very bad camera. Would not recommend

Reviews.Title: Great surprise.
Reviews.Author: Adrià Miserachs Navarro
Reviews.Content: More than I expected.Highly recommended.Incredible battery runtime.Just be wanting a little more resolution on the photos9 points
